flex2.compiler.util

Class CompilerMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • flex2.compiler.CompilerException
          • flex2.compiler.util.CompilerMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILocalizableMessage, Message, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompilerMessage.CompilerError, CompilerMessage.CompilerInfo, CompilerMessage.CompilerWarning

    public class CompilerMessage
extends CompilerException
implements ILocalizableMessage
    This class provides a common base class for all localizable exceptions thrown by the compiler. It can be used in catch statements, but it shouldn't be constructed directly. A subclass should be used when reporting an error or warning.
    Author:
    Roger Gonzalez
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
